Content:
Hi. If I have a quickshifter and an exhaust same as ZX10R, could MT-25 make that same sound while shifting? "Kawasaki Ninja ZX10R (2014) with Quickshifter and straight piped Akrapovic." is written in the description.

Note: I don't know anything about bikes.
